pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easily Create and Style Tables for LaTeX, HTML and Other Formats // Like 'xtable', creates styled tables. Export to HTML, LaTeX, 'Word', 'Excel', 'PowerPoint' and other formats. Simple, modern interface to manipulate borders, size, position, captions, colours, text styles and number formatting. Includes a 'huxreg' function for creation of regression tables, and 'quick_*' one-liners to print data to a new document.
